abstracts.cdata!:
The project would provide improvement
            and an increase in capacity of India's domestic
            telecommunications system during 1976/77 through 1978/79 by
            installation of additional telephone lines and associated
            facilities, expansion of trunk line facilities, extension of
            service to rural areas, and an increase in telex services.
